elements.title: space travel in science fiction (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that rockets (example pictured) are one of the classic methods of space travel in science fiction?

elements.title: Cedar Hill Yard (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Cedar Hill Yard in New Haven, Connecticut, could hold more than 15,000 railroad cars at one time?

elements.title: Rex Julius (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Able Seaman Rex Julius was the lowest-ranked Australian official war artist of World War II?

elements.title: Trump International Hotel and Tower (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a feng shui consultant convinced Donald Trump not to use a gold color for New York City's Trump International Hotel and Tower?

elements.title: South Africa women's tour of England in 2018 (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the second match of South Africa women's tour of England in 2018 was the first time a women's international cricket match had featured three centuries?

elements.title: George Lauder (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that George Lauder, a surgeon in the Jacobite Army under Bonnie Prince Charlie, treated the wounded of both sides after the Battle of Prestonpans?

elements.title: green weevil (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that adults and larvae of the green weevil damage a wide range of plants?

elements.title: Jones (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that a man named Jones played one baseball game for the New York Metropolitans in 1885?
